verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> Then I stood <S%G2476><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the sand <S%G285><s%> of the sea. <S%G2281><s%> <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> a beast <S%G2342><s%> coming up <S%G305><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> horns <S%G2768><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> heads. <S%G2776><s%> <S%G2532><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> horns <S%G2768><s%> were ten <S%G1176><s%> crowns, <S%G1238><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> heads, <S%G2776><s%> blasphemous <S%G988><s%> names. <S%G3686><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> One <S%G3391><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> looked <S%G1492><s%> like it had been <S%G5613><s%> wounded <S%G4969><s%> <S%G1519><s%> fatally. <S%G2288><s%> <S%G2532><s%> His <S%G846><s%> fatal <S%G2288><s%> wound <S%G4127><s%> was healed, <S%G2323><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> marveled <S%G2296><s%> <S%G1722><s%> at <S%G3694><s%> the beast. <S%G2342><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They worshiped <S%G4352><s%> the dragon, <S%G1404><s%> because <S%G3739><s%> he gave <S%G1325><s%> his authority <S%G1849><s%> to the beast, <S%G2342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they worshiped <S%G4352><s%> the beast, <S%G2342><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Who <S%G5101><s%> is like <S%G3664><s%> the beast? <S%G2342><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> is able <S%G1410><s%> to make war <S%G4170><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him? <S%G846><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> A mouth <S%G4750><s%> speaking <S%G2980><s%> great things <S%G3173><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blasphemy <S%G988><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> to him. <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> to make war <S%G4160><s%> for forty <S%G5062><s%> - two <S%G1417><s%> months <S%G3376><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> to him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He opened <S%G455><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> blasphemy <S%G988><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> to blaspheme <S%G987><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name, <S%G3686><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> dwelling, <S%G4633><s%> <S%G2532><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who dwell <S%G4637><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> dwell <S%G2730><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> will worship <S%G4352><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> everyone whose <S%G3739><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> has <S%G1125><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> been written <S%G1125><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the book <S%G976><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%> of the Lamb <S%G721><s%> who has been killed. <S%G4969><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> an ear, <S%G3775><s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>

If <S%G1536><s%> anyone is to go <S%G4863><s%> into captivity, <S%G161><s%> he will go <S%G5217><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> captivity. <S%G161><s%> If <S%G1536><s%> anyone is to be killed <S%G615><s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3162><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the sword, <S%G3162><s%> he must <S%G1163><s%> be killed. <S%G615><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the endurance <S%G5281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> of the saints. <S%G40><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> another <S%G243><s%> beast <S%G2342><s%> coming up <S%G305><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the earth. <S%G1093><s%> <S%G2532><s%> He had <S%G2192><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> horns <S%G2768><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> a lamb, <S%G721><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he spoke <S%G2980><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> a dragon. <S%G1404><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He performs <S%G4160><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> signs, <S%G4592><s%> <S%G2443><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> making <S%G4160><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> come down <S%G2597><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of the sky <S%G3772><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of people. <S%G444><s%>
